chunks.zh: 除了 V2EX，上班时间划水的地方还有哪些
chunks.en: Besides V2EX, what other places are good for slacking off during work hours?

chunks.zh: 除了 V2EX ，上班时间划水的地方有哪些。就想了解了解。
chunks.en: Besides V2EX, what places are good for slacking off during work hours? Just want to know.

chunks.zh: 厕所
chunks.en: Toilet

chunks.zh: 尼玛，海角社区？ 我以为是和 v2 类似的社区，擦！上班时间，吓死我了！
chunks.en: Damn, Haijiao community? I thought it was a community similar to V2, crap! During work hours, it scared me to death!

chunks.zh: sf.gg ，因为我是搞前端，所以就是 codepen.io 看热门 和 dev.to 。但是绝大多数情况只能碎片化的刷刷 v2
chunks.en: sf.gg, because I'm a front-end developer, I use codepen.io to see what's popular and dev.to. But in most cases, I can only browse V2 in fragmented time.

chunks.zh: https://bbs.oldmantvg.net/   这里的交流很友好
chunks.en: https://bbs.oldmantvg.net/ The communication here is very friendly

chunks.zh: @LiYanHong 这波和头像配合的很好
chunks.en: @LiYanHong This wave cooperates well with the avatar

chunks.zh: 虎扑步行街、煎蛋、各种微信小程序游戏
chunks.en: Hupu Walking Street, Jiandan, and various WeChat mini-game

chunks.en: @opengps Skiing

chunks.zh: https://news.ycombinator.com/over?points=350只推荐这个
chunks.en: https://news.ycombinator.com/over?points=350 only recommend this

chunks.en: Just discovered it, play together https://poki.com/zh

chunks.en: WeChat official accounts, Zhihu, chiphell

chunks.zh: 微信群，各类 ghs.你懂的。
chunks.en: WeChat groups, all kinds of ghs. You know.

chunks.en: Youtube X Telegram Reddit Github XDA BBC VOA

chunks.zh: @jgh004 去百度了一下，显然 ghs 我不懂😁
chunks.en: @jgh004 I did a Baidu search, obviously I don't understand ghs 😁

chunks.zh: @xiongperry 搞黄色
chunks.en: @xiongperry Go for the yellow stuff

chunks.zh: 各 BBS 论坛，STAGE1 HIPDA NGA ，微信公众号 微博 telegram 再刷一刷
chunks.en: Various BBS forums, STAGE1 HIPDA NGA, WeChat official accounts, Weibo and telegram to browse

chunks.en: Tianya Community and Haijiao Community

chunks.en: @dfkjgklfdjg Front-end guru, I’ll find you to learn front-end when I have time

chunks.en: 少数派 wikipedia
